long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CommandMate is an easy-to-use extension that lets Twitch viewers interact directly with a streamer’s commands. With this extension viewers can quickly see all available commands which can be organized into categories. 

This is like having the menu to the secret menu items at In-N-Out!
